install.name: Quick Jump Menu
install.author: Walid Nehme
install.description: This Module Creates a drop down menu listing all sub menu items from a menu.

param.name: menu
param.label: Select your Menu
param.description: The name of the menu you wish the module to display - if no menu is selected the mainmenu is loaded

param.name: ordering
param.label: Sort By:
param.description: Sort Menu items in Drop down Menu by Ascending/Descending

param.name: startln
param.label: First line in drop down menu
